languages.text: {n}Маражай с неподдельным интересом посматривает то на серые листья, то на вас, однако сам держится поодаль.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай с неподдельным интересом посматривает то на серые листья, то на вас, однако сам держится поодаль.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai examines the grey leaves with genuine interest, then shifts his gaze to you and back again, keeping a respectable distance from both.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは純粋な好奇心から灰色の葉を観察する。それから視線をなたと葉の間を行きつ戻りつさせながら、どちらとも適度な距離を保っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai examines the grey leaves with genuine interest, then shifts his gaze to you and back again, keeping a respectable distance from both.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは純粋な好奇心から灰色の葉を観察する。それから視線をなたと葉の間を行きつ戻りつさせながら、どちらとも適度な距離を保っている。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai examina las hojas grises con sincero interés. Te mira, y vuelve a mirar la planta, guardando una respetuosa distancia con l{mf|o|a}s dos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai examines the grey leaves with genuine interest, then shifts his gaze to you and back again, keeping a respectable distance from both.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai examina las hojas grises con sincero interés. Te mira, y vuelve a mirar la planta, guardando una respetuosa distancia con l{mf|o|a}s dos.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋带着浓厚的兴趣盯着灰色的叶片观察了半晌，看了看你，又看了看叶子，然后与你和它谨慎地拉开了一段距离。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai examines the grey leaves with genuine interest, then shifts his gaze to you and back again, keeping a respectable distance from both.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋带着浓厚的兴趣盯着灰色的叶片观察了半晌，看了看你，又看了看叶子，然后与你和它谨慎地拉开了一段距离。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai examine tour à tour votre personne et les feuilles grises avec une curiosité non feinte, en veillant à garder une distance respectable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai examines the grey leaves with genuine interest, then shifts his gaze to you and back again, keeping a respectable distance from both.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai examine tour à tour votre personne et les feuilles grises avec une curiosité non feinte, en veillant à garder une distance respectable.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai untersucht die grauen Blätter mit aufrichtigem Interesse. Dann richtet er seinen Blick auf dich. Dann wieder auf die Blätter. Zu beiden hält er einen angemessenen Abstand.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai examines the grey leaves with genuine interest, then shifts his gaze to you and back again, keeping a respectable distance from both.{/n}

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, gri yaprakları gerçekten ilgiyle inceliyor. Ardından da bakışlarını bir sana bir de yapraklara çevirip ikinizden de hayli uzakta duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai examines the grey leaves with genuine interest, then shifts his gaze to you and back again, keeping a respectable distance from both.{/n}
